snippet.title: Echo Combat | E3 Teaser Trailer | Oculus Rift
snippet.description:
Visit https://ocul.us/EchoCombat to learn more about Ready at Dawn’s gravity-free competitive FPS, Echo Combat.
 
Ready the team. Aim for victory. Fire up the payload! Join the open beta today for Echo Combat, the upcoming first-person, competitive, space-combat shooter from Ready at Dawn Studios.
 
The award-winning VR developers of Echo Arena and Lone Echo are back and ready to blast with some gravity-free fighting fun, only on Oculus Rift. Become futuristic battle androids with your friends, and team up against each other in payload-based missions. Fend off enemies from all angles with high-tech lasers, explosives, and more. Use every inch of the battle arena to take cover, push, pull, and glide your way to victory.
 
Brace yourself FPS fans. You’ve never felt recoil like this.

Learn more about Ready at Dawn: 
Website: http://www.readyatdawn.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ReadyAtDawnStudios
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RAD_Studios
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ReadyAtDawnStudios/
 
Official Oculus Channels:
Oculus: http://ocul.us/Oculus 
Facebook: http://ocul.us/Facebook 
Twitter: http://ocul.us/Twitter 
Instagram: http://ocul.us/Instagram
 
Buy Rift: www.oculus.com/rift
Follow Oculus Rift on Facebook, Twitter, & Instagram:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OculusRift
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OculusRift
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oculusrift
